Job Description, , Constantly growing, we are looking for a new face to complement our Marketing team for 56 months, starting from 1st of January, working at least 32 hours per week Will you join us in our quest to create a healthier and happier world, , As Virtuagyms you will have a direct impact on the creation of social media and video content for our company With your colleagues, you will get to work on exciting projects during which youll be invited to pitch your fresh ideas and solutions, , , , As a Video Marketing Intern, youll create video content and help manage our Social media channels Youll work together with the team to provide the best social experience and service on all channels youll create nice posts, stories and concepts contributing to the engagement and the conversation with our community Youll also support the Marketing Team in developing multiple multimedia projects, , , , , , , , , , , , , , , Next to being inspired daily by talented and motivated colleagues, having plenty of opportunities for personal and professional growth, and working in an office with a stunning view near the Amsterdam Amstel station, these are the main Virtuagym perks, , , , , Virtuagym is a leading tech company providing innovative fitness software for gyms, personal trainers, and corporate health services Virtuagym has grown into an allinone solution for client coaching, membership management, billing, scheduling, access control and more Its integrated mobile fitness apps offer solutions for exercise, nutrition guidance, progress tracking, and online coaching, , With 200 employees across two offices in Europe and Latin America, Virtuagym supports more than 15 million endusers, 30,000 trainers worldwide and over 6,000 health clubs, including BasicFit NL, Xercise4Less UK, various YMCAs USA, and XSport USA, , With over 100 growth every year, we keep reinventing ourselves in the fastpaced fitness technology domain While we are beyond the startup phase, we still cherish our startup culture and noncorporate approach At Virtuagym you get the opportunity to grow and we empower you to explore, learn and do great things as we conquer the world with our great solutions, , , , Please do not hesitate to apply by clicking the Apply for this Job button below We will get back to your application within 5 working days, , For any questions on the vacancy, please get in touch with the recruitment team at, , Please note that we do not collaborate with third parties to fill this vacancy

We are on the lookout for a hair and beautyobsessed Social Media Manager to join our team Based in Almere, NL  Immediate Start, , About Us, , Gisou by Negin Mirsalehi is a luxury haircare line by famous Dutch  Persian fashion influencer, Negin Mirsalehi Founded in 2015, the brand has deep roots and a wonderful story of the coming together of family traditions The signature ingredients within these staple products are honey and propolis, derived from the Mirsalehi Bee Garden where Negin and her father continue the 6generation family tradition of beekeeping Using natures gifts Negins mother created a formula to transform hair which is rich in minerals, vitamins and antioxidants, , The mission of Gisou is to inspire people to appreciate and take care of their hair using naturebased products, and to feel beautiful while doing so With their story they want to raise awareness about the importance of bees for the overall ecosystem, and shine a light on the incredible benefits of what they produce, , Gisou is currently available on and offline in over 30 countries, and continues to expand rapidly internationally To continue on this growth trajectory, the team is on the lookout for a beautyloving Social Media Manager to manage one of the most important parts of our brand, , , , As a socially led brand which is experiencing rapid growth, it was only right that we get a superstar Social Media Manager onboard This is a role for someone who is passionate about Social Media and the Gisou community You will have proven experience in managing and growing brands across all social channels, and be an innovative individual able to bring successful initiatives onboard to grow our community, build brand awareness and drive engagement globally This is the perfect role for someone strategic with an affinity for creativity, , , , , WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR, , , , , The opportunity to be part of a young, fun and dynamic team, with a pleasant informal  international working atmosphere and regular fun team activities and drinks Gisou is a fastgrowing and disruptive beauty company that offers huge opportunities for personal development and growth, , INTERESTED, , We cant wait to hear from you
